section.para: You can give me feedback in different ways:

listitem.para: Bugtracker: http://saigkill-bugs.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issues. There you can place bug reports and feature requests.
OpenHub: https://www.openhub.net/p/youtube_dlhelper. OpenHub is a statistics provider for open source projects. There you can set yourself as user.
Openhatch: http://openhatch.org/projects/youtube_dlhelper. Its a community builder tool. Just browse to it.

section.para: If you like my program and use it regular, please think about a donation: https://pledgie.com/campaigns/29423 or at http://www.amazon.de/registry/wishlist/D75HOEQ00BDD
Also you are invited to visit my blog on http://saigkill.github.io.
